name: assistant
description: A general Assistant agent that can help a user with a variety of questions and can call other agents to accomplish tasks.

welcome.title: NEAR AI. The only Assistant you need.
welcome.description: What can I help you with today? I can answer questions and call other agents to accomplish tasks for you. For example: 'shop for headphones', 'swap NEAR for BTC', 'create a memecoin about space', 'shop for new shirts', 'remember my favorite color is purple'.
